main.name: Shivani Agarwal
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe Code
main.bio: Hi there! I am Shivani! A quirky, creative final year Engineering student exploring Technology & its roots. I am currently working on Web Development technologies and designing graceful websites. I've organised a Tech Fest and sports event at my college and Presented Technical studies several times. I know to manage my coding, academics, exploration of new technologies, and have FUN all in 24 hours.

education.school: Dr. A.P.J Abdul Kalam Technical University-INDIA
education.description: Securing First Position with taking all the perks of college life

work.title: Using HTML CSS JavaScript for building Personal Projects
work.description: Trying to Clone all the apps possible for better learning. On the way to clone the world!
